modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod selects random wood stair blocks and makes them into trap blocks, where you or a zombie might fall through the stairs.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod selects random wood stair blocks and makes them into “[trap](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/)” blocks, where you or a [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombie-mods/) might fall through the stairs. Only set for normal wood stairs, none of the fancy railing stuff works well at the moment.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_StairwayToHell)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/)
